content.detailedDescription:
your doing a great job keep it up, heres some web cam pics i came across after you gave the heads up. i have alot more in comparison to your pics, but these are the best so far that ive captured.

 the file names give dates and times corrisponding with az web cams.
content.summary: Guy from arizona...

content.detailedDescription: As i walked out the front door of my apartment building i looked up and saw a huge thick contrail which my eye followed going down towards the lake. the contrail was in a east/west position. the rest of the sky was clear blue. when i stepped out of my front door i was alittle taken back by this enourous cloud that almost looked like a tornado cloud elongated from the lake at such a distance past 900 west. while i stood there and just looked at this i then saw a white circle that had a greenish almost lime green cast to it and from my point of view was a big as a very large beachball at an altitude of about 500 feet above me. it was transparent and it was moving like it was gliding in the west direction several feet away from this contrail. it almost looked like someone was shining a spotlight in the sky. i looked to see if i could see anything making this transparent circle but did not see any other aircraft such as a helicopter with a spotlight hiding inside this huge contrail. i also did not hear any aircraft. i watched as this orb then changed direction towards the south and went under the contrail and dissappeared.
content.summary: White/greenish cast translucent flat orb in blue morning sky moving around next to huge contrail that did not disapate

content.detailedDescription:
That was the most "amazing" picture of a "b1_rd" in flight...White belly...Extended neck...Typical flight position.
please stop with the az web cams and go look for that job with the audubon society.
content.summary: Az bird watcher

content.detailedDescription:
Here is a still shot from white tank mountains arizona webcam on 11/27/2007 at 9:30am.
there were three unknown objects in the sky and one close to the ground.

more objects are in the still shot just before this one has objects near the mountain and one looks to be close to the shape of the object near the ground.

i have analyzed this photo inside and out and its not a duck or bird due to many factors including distance size and proportion.

there are webcams all over the world and its almost impossible to watch them all so i stay with some of the good ones.
content.summary: Close-up ufo on phoenix webcam

content.detailedDescription: If you look at the photo, which was taken directly over my house at sunset, you can see a trail of circular lights either entering or leaving the dark cloud in the middle.  [i did not notice this at the time i was taking the picture.]  the cloud itself was strange, as it was thick and dark, and extended for quite a distance across the sky.  if you look inside the cloud, near the entry point, there seem to be two or three discernable dots, which might be lights inside the cloud.  this is why i checked the "triangle" box above, as it is possible that there is a triangular object inside the dark cloud (just a hunch!).  i don't believe that the white orbs are due to dust or light reflection, as the "trail" seems to be entering or leaving the dark cloud at exactly the right point (based on the darkness and thickness of the cloud).
content.summary: I took several pictures of the sunset that night, and this strange series of orbs appeared (see attached).

content.detailedDescription: I live on the third floor and have a porch with no roof.I decided to go out and have a cigarette and look at the stars which were nice and bright seeing how a cold front had passed by earlier.I was looking up towards the northeast when i saw to the north what i thought was going to be an advertisment searchlight , but the lit up area continued to come straight towards me and flew directly over me and continued to the south towards green airport in rhode island.As it passed overhead there was no noise what so ever and it continued in a straight projectory.As it whent overhead i could make out all the details of its shape.It was a boomerang shape with six large round glowing red lighted areas,three under each wing which were almost the size of a full moon.On the back side of the red areas which were evenly spaced on the wings there was a purplish haze and the whole body of the craft? seemed to be a very light violet color.It seemed so stealth like.I want to say it was like a well defined mirage or holograph or kind of cloaked a little but yet i could make out all the features of it,which there was not many of to see.I was amazed by its beauty almost awed by it.I felt astonished.I did not feel like i had been observed by it.As it passed overhead and towards rhode island it went beyond my view.
content.summary: Traveled north to south and went directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I came home last night and i looked up at the stars.  i noticed that there was a yellow star among the other white stars.  i kept staring at it, all of a sudden it moved slowly to the right.  then is sat there for a couple minutes, then moved up.  this kept happening, it would go to the right more, then stop, down, stop, left stop.  i didnt know if it was a satellite, it was just amazing.  i just watched it from my deck for a about 20 minutes.  it was not a plane, as it would keep changing directions, in a small space of the air.  and it didnt move at certain times, once it sat for about 10 minutes in one spot, other times it would move every couple seconds.  unbelievable.  after about 20 minutes, it seemed to get small dots around it, or change to a flat star instead of round and then faded out.  i didnt know what to do after that.  i wished i had some one there to see it with me.  i am hoping that someone else saw a similar thing.
content.summary: It was a yellow looking star, yet it moved around in different directions

content.detailedDescription: I looked up into the sky and saw this strange anomally.
content.summary: I saw a strange object that traveled at an undeterminate speed and made a large wooshing sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Ive seen this object from time to time, it appears to rotate and flsh colors.  as it hovers in the distance it appears to "dance" up and down, slowly, then zooms east.  i thought it was a planet, then a helicopter, but now i know it isnt, because both of those objects cannot move like that.


i was in bed and saw this object out of my window, i noticed it as i was about to go to sleep.  it just didnt look right.  but then it disappeared and then i went to bed.

i will try to take pictures next time.
content.summary: Object in distance

content.detailedDescription: This is not a ufo sighting.  this is a cms training case.
content.summary: Cms training case

content.detailedDescription:
I am in telepathic contact with intelligent life, and i have seen several ufos.  on this occasion, i happened to be lying down in salt lake city, near the greyhound bus station waiting for a bus, when i looked up and saw a swirling mass of lights moving around and blinking on and off.  they looked a lot like stars, but brighter.  i was telepathed that it was a celebration for my having contacted the cia about my contact and sending emails to governments explaining much of the alien agendas.  please see the mufon webboards under "the black triangles", subheading under "ufo crafts/ships", subheading under "ufo talk", for more details, including a few emails the aliens had me send out.

by the way, i am completely sane and this is not a hoax.  i truly have been in telepathic contact with extraterrestrials since around 1996.
content.summary: Laying down looked up saw dozens of lights that looked like stars flashing and moving

content.detailedDescription:
I am in telepathic contact with intelligent life, and on the night in question i was telepathed to "look up" [verbatim], and upon doing so, i witnessed the ufo.

for more detailed information about my contact, please read the mufon webboards under "the black triangles" (pages 8 on), subheading under "ufo crafts/ships", subheading under "ufo talk".  my handle with the mufon webboards is "smokeytbones", a handle the aliens gave me because i smoke, which they do not like.
content.summary: Silent hovering larger-than-airplane trilighted colored lights solid black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Approximate date:  1983 age 7
approximate time:  9pm-12am.

i had been sleeping then awoke suddenly & got out of bed.  i walked over to my dresser where there were 3 white, bald humanoid creatures that were about as tall as i was.  i wasn���t scared, just curious.  the main guy was standing closest to me & the others were behind to the side him.   he motioned to the dresser where there was a large bottle of pills tipped over & spilt out onto the surface.  there was no speaking involved, but i knew he wanted me to take a pill.  i refused & he insisted again.  at this point i became very afraid & turned to open bedroom door which was a few feet to my right.  i ran toward the door, but was blocked in the doorway.  now i was so frightened, i could see the brightly lit hallway just a few feet away & the stairs.  i tried again & was still resisted.  the third time i broke through & ran downstairs to my mom.  i still remember this incident vividly & wonder what would have happed if i���d taken a pill & how did i eventually get through the door (was there something or someone protecting me).  i wondered if it had been a dream, but the fact that i ran out & downstairs & remembered going back to bed after being downstairs was unusual to me - unless i���d been dreaming & sleeping walking.  after that night i was intrigued & terrified of ufos & aliens.  i was afraid that et would come & get me & if battlestar galactica was on i���d close my eyes so i wouldn���t see the bald aliens.   i had many dreams about ufos landing in my yard & a particularly freaky dream of a typical gray peeking in my window (which has access from a rooftop).  the second part of this story came in approx. 1999, when i jokingly asked the family at thanksgiving dinner if anybody had ever seen a ufo.  my older brother, who is a big serious guy said that he had seen a ufo when he was about 15 yrs old.  he saw it out his bedroom window (which was in the front of the house, mine in the back) & it was about a block away.  i asked him if he was serious & he was - he doesn���t make things up & especially about something like this.  i had never told anyone about my incident until 2000 & never told my brother.   every night i was terrified until maybe 16 or 17 yrs old when i knew so deep within myself that i didn���t have to be afraid anymore.  i don���t believe i was ever ���abducted��� & am not sure about the whole aliens from another world concept, but do believe there are many things in this world, universe & dimensions that we don���t have a clue about.  i am a medical professional in good health & come from a loving & stable family.  i have always liked the bible verse ���he has given his angels charge over you to guard you in all your ways��� .  now that i think of it, it���s still written on the attic door that was right near my room at my parent���s house.  also, now that i remember i did have nightmares when i was young - many were about something coming out of the dark & i���m cowering in the corner of my room & trying to scream, but can���t.  but i know that nightmares are common in childhood & sleep is a strange phenomenon & can generate situations & feelings that seem real, but aren���t.  that���s why i���ll never really know if all that i went through was just in my mind or was a real, physical event with mysterious creatures.  i���m a seeing-is-believing kind of gal & super practical, but like the idea of the strange, unusual & unknown.  now, i have the x-files theme song in my mind���
content.summary: An unusual incident...

content.detailedDescription:
I also saw the stationary bright gold object under/rt side of the moon on 11/26.  i was getting into my car on the way to work at 11:15pm, when i noticed it & thought it was very unusual.  i wondered what it could be & was puzzled because the moon was so bright & most stars/planets would be dimmed that close to the moon. i wished i could have watched it for a longer time - it was just so interesting & out of the ordinary. 
the next day, i looked up different astronomy web sites to see if the professionals had any info on it - there wasn't any.  who knows what it was.  i like a good mystery.  far west chicago 'burbs.
content.summary: Bright object by moon 11/26/07

content.detailedDescription: At around midnight early in november-07 i was in front of my home having a last cig for the day when my wife lori came out to do the same and she pointed out a set of lights off to our west accross the lake, (lake havasu) the light were, one main very bright light in the center and onr green light on each side. the main light was very bright when it shown directly in our direction. the object wes coming off the mountains on the calif. side of the lake when we noticed it and it came down the valley heading east towards us, desending also. we were assuming the object was a helicopter landing at the casino accross the lake. but it did not land there, it passed it towards the water and landed in the water and disappeared into it!. we watched the area for it to re-amerge but it did not. i also did not see any emegency vehicles approach the area. we are about 2.5 miles from the lake and live on a bluff area and have great view of the mount range and can see portions of the lake. we are on the north-central part or town. i stayed out for around another 20mnts or so thinking about what we saw, my wife went in soon after as she accepted the helicopter expl. i have asked some concerning this but no one seen it. i am not crazy or seeing things it did land in the water, the lights did distort some what when it submerged.  take it for what its worth..
content.summary: Object decended off mount. range and landed in lake.

content.detailedDescription:
October 28, 1971

while waiting for the boat launch to open so i could go fishing, i noticed a glow in the marsh just across the bayou (bienvenue). i thought the marsh was on fire, but it wasn't. the glowing object rose to about 100 or so feet and hovered there for several minutes. the object had a metalic appearance in the color of silvery blue. there was no noise coming from the object. the outter rim of the disc at it's middle changed colors from a gold to blue to red at random moments. the disc stood quite motionless and never wobbled. after approximately 15 minutes, the disc sped upward and north toward lake pontchatrain which was only about 4 miles away. its' speed was incredible, something i have never seen before and it came to a standstill over the lake as quickly as it had sped away from the marsh. after a couple of minutes the disc again sped away moving upward and toward the west until it was out of sight. i have always been a skeptic of u.F.O. s and until that moment i was. there is no doubt in my mind that the disc was vehicle that was being controlled by someone or something. it was also far more advanced than anything we or any other country have. i didn't see any little green men or any other color, but i know what i saw and i know it was real. i was fully awake, sober and not in the least interested in seeing anything other than fish.

there are times when i wish i had never seeen the disc. people tend to ridicule things they don't understand or accept. there are also many times when i am grateful for the opportunity. i have become a more open minded individual, not so easy to reject what others might have knowledge of. i feel a part of a much larger universe than the one i knew before the sighting and that's a good feeling, a belonging feeling.

we have much to learn from whom ever these visitors are. i hope that one day they will share their knowledge so that perhaps my grandchildren or their children might share in the wealth they have to offer.

thanks for listening
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched rise from marsh, hover, then speed away at an amazing velocity

content.detailedDescription: Please parden my spelling,,i had a head injusry and cant always speel well anymre,,,i was leaving pete and collys tavern this perticular night,,,i was not drunk,,,,pete went out the door and was goning to lock up behind me,,he shouted for me to come out and see somthing,,,it appeared tobe a hugh object traveling south over the west ban of the hudson riveer,,,,it was at least a half mile long and matbe 1/4 mile wide  and coming at us at maybe 2000 ft altitude,,,im a pilot with some 700 hours in light planes,,,,we watched them until the front got over head,,,then it started a right turn to the west,,,this was when i figured them out,,,they got out of formation an i could hear the sound of everday light plane engines,,,this seems to bee the hugh ufo seen over this area several times,,,it was about 15 or more light planes with funny lights on them,,[no stadardnav lights were seen],,,,,,over the years of a long haul over the road truing carrear,,,i did see 5 things in the night sy that were not airplanes,,,1 was in daylight in ft lauderdale fla,,also witnesed by my mother and several of her friends,,,i also saw this very large lie a 747 fusealage with no wings etc in the night in vero beach fla.,,,also saw a very bright white light goig west over i-95 doeing extreme maduvers at an unbeliveabel speed right after i saw a saturn night launch while traveling nort,,,,,i have seen many jet fighters at near mac at airshows ,,,thies speeds were way fast ,,in the 1000s,,,,in nthe late 60s i witnesed a bright yellow light going around the indian point atomic power plant in peesill ny,,,it was silent and flew around on a foggy night,,,i got bac in my car and went several miles south and stopped again,,it was still going aroound and was more to my north.  it made no sound and only the yellow light was visible. also saw 3 small bright white lites apear in the night sky just north of the turkey lake service area on the fla toll road,,,they came from the south and dove at a 45 angle towards and from my right to my weft,,,2 did this,,,several seconds and the 2nd ight did the same they stopped an then went back up at a 45 % angle still on the north east course,,they were extremely fast,,,,i had just parked my truck in the vero beach 75 truck stop off i-95 when i saw the {twice the size of a 747 fuselage] going sout dirctly over the intersate,,,its speed had to be in excess of several thousand miles an hour,,,it was moderatly foggy and the interste ended there in those days,,,we had to run thru the groves over to the fla toll road,,,,this was witnessed by another trucker,,,,,driving like i did kept me up many nights,,,i did see a meteor come straight down one night just west of batavis ny,,,it was a clear winter night with a full moon,,,it made a bright blue streak,,,i always wandered what it was made of to leave a blue light,,,the smoke trail was very visible in the full moon light,,,,,in the early 50s my mom and her mom saw f-86s from stewart afb chase a yellow light all over the sky over stony point ny,,this went on for some 15 minutes before the yellow light went straight up and ut of sight ,,,my mom and grandmother often talked about that,,,,
content.summary: Appered to be hugh flying object ,,only lights visibale

content.detailedDescription:
Nov 23, 2007 black friday
i left this morning for work at 5:00 am. it was still dark out. i'm heading south down m100 towards the highway and traffic was very light, almost none existent going down this stretch of road. a lot of the stores opened around 4am, some midnight, so i figured i missed a majority of the shopping traffic. about a good 3 miles before the highway i see a bright, bright, bright, huge white light low in the sky towards the direction i was heading (south). it was too big to be a planet, or a star, satellite, plane, or helicopter and it just sat there in the same spot the entire 3 miles i drove to get to the highway. i mean it didn't move at all. it stayed in the same exact spot. i take this road everyday, and this light was with out a question...Out of the norm.
by the time i got to the highway bridge (i 96), this thing was just a huge beacon low in the sky. there was no way anyone could miss it because not only was it huge, it was low, very, very low in the sky. there wasn't a lot of traffic in this area, but there was some, and for the life of me i couldn't figure out why nobody was stopping their cars to look at this thing. i mean it was right there as big as life just sitting there in the air behind mcdonalds in an empty farm field not moving at all. with my camera ready that i pulled out of my purse, i wasn't taking the highway, even if i was going to be late for work, instead i went up one road and took grand river heading east. i made my left turn onto grand river and since that road was empty, no traffic, i didn't pull into the mcdonalds right there because of the parking lot lights, instead i drove past it to the edge of the farm field and slowed down onto the shoulder with my camera ready to go and there it was just sitting there in mid air. it was just a big, kind of oblong, bright, bright, bright while light. i was looking out my passenger window at it and didn't even get my car to a stop and this huge object just took off and started booking east, just like that, and that's when i seen it was a triangle as it got further from me. it was now heading in the same direction i was going (east) so i pulled back onto the road and sped up to try and catch it. it wasn���t directly over the road, but moving along right next to it on my right side. this triangle was so low, and just so huge in size i was half expecting it to take a couple tree tops out. now i'm driving down grand river after this thing, watching it through my windshield, but i just wasn't fast enough to catch up to it. by the time i passed granger landfill i seen it move across grand river in front of me, still very, very low, now heading west. it dwarfed the oncoming cars headlights big time. if you were to take the flyin j���s building length wise and hang it over the road, that���s how big it was. 5 seconds later, when i got to fl yin' j's gas station it was gone. just like that it was gone. i looked everywhere, every part of the sky because it was a good clear, distance view all around. it was just gone. i just don't get why nobody else stopped? it was right there as big as life and nobody stopped. how could they have not seen it?
i didn't get a picture or video. the camera was right there in my hand, but i was so busy just looking at it through my windshield and driving at the same time there just wasn't time. 
note...There is a small national guard base in that area, so it may be one of their triangle craft's i seen, but then again i'm not sure if that base would even have those types of craft. 
i made a drawing, but it is weak in comparison to seeing the actual thing up close and personal.
content.summary: Black friday.........Triangle object observed in the am

content.detailedDescription: The brilliant near moon object was observed on 11/26/2007 and not on 29th as in first report.
content.summary: Re:  brilliant near moon....Had wrong date

content.detailedDescription:
Was looking out window and up at moon (if one was facing north, the moon would be about 2pm-3pm) but what caught my eye was an extremely bright object at about 4 o'clock to the moon (facing the moon which was east) and very close.
it was not a star.  it was not another planet.  i got hi powered binoculars and looked....It appeared to be a space vehicle of some sort and i could discern bright red lights on top and on bottom.  at times the space vehicle object seemed to have an orangey glow.  i watched it for several hours.  i've never seen an object which appeared to be so close to the moon.  i could not discern its speed, direction etc.  it was too far out.

it was not there on the next night november 30th, nor did i see it on november 28th.  only on 29th.

i do not believe it was the international space station......I don't think the iss was orbiting almost directly east of northern california, the san francisco bay area.

when i first noticed this space vehicle object i questioned 'what the heck is that by the moon?'....I thought it might be an asteroid because it was so brilliant and bright and large!!  then i remembered the night before there was nothing next to the moon like that.  i got my hi powered binoculars to look.  

the red lights were very discernable on this object.

this was not an airplane.
content.summary: Extreme bright object in space

content.detailedDescription: After i had finished watching the iu/gt basketball game and a few minutes of the wisconsin/duke game, i decided to head down stairs to do something else.  as i passed by the back patio window that faces north, i glanced outside.  in the northeastern sky i noticed this really brightly dual flashing object (much like the strobe light on the top of a school bus).  i watched it for several seconds to make out what it was and to determine it's flight path.  i couldn't.  it seemed to be hovering or moving directly away from me to give the appearance of hovering.  i asked my father who was still watching the wisconsin/duke game to take a look as well.  he came over and thought it was strange not to see any indication of red flashing wing tip lights like on a plane.  i stepped outside to get a better look and noticed another strange object in the sky further away that seemed to be descending rapidly from a much higher more due east position.  i almost thought this second object to be a falling star at first glance, but it didn't have a tail and didn't disappeared after several seconds. after watching it for several seconds it almost gave me the impression of a satellite, it was that dim and far away. it's trajectory was straight down.  it didn't seem to be in a free fall or burning up in the atmosphere as it descended, so my impression is that it was descending safely under it's own power.  this object had the same white flashing pattern but also had a dimmer solid white light as well.  it was the very dim solid light that reminded me of a satellite traveling across the night sky.  after several minutes, dad wanted the patio door closed so the cats wouldn't escape so i decided to come inside and get my digital camera to see if i could get some video.  when i went back outside, the objects had both disappeared.  this was approximately one to two minutes or less that i was inside.  it's a bit strange in another way because it was very clear outside and i can usually see up to 3 commercial jets at any one time using the same flight path (the same as each other, not either of the two objects) from o'hare heading east.  there was nothing else except these two objects in the sky during this time.  i went back out later and these commercial flights had again resumed at their normal (very high) altitude and flight paths.  note: dad suggested it might have been a helicopter, so this is the most likely explanation, but i thought i would pass this along and let you investigate further.  let me know your findings.  i am very curious.
content.summary: Very bright dual flashing white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was in fourth grade, and i will never forget it.  i was t my friends camp up on oneida lake.  we were having a small bonfire roasting marshmallows, the usual.  we were right on the shore of the lake and it was kind of cloudy like a storm was about to blow in but over the water was clear.  we were looking up at the stars and then out of the clouds came a very large disc shaped object with a lot of flsking lights...It wasn't a plane, it made no noise and just hovered.  the lights were many different colors, not just red and green and thats how we also knew it wasn't a plane.  it literally just hovered there for about 5 minutes at the absolute most and then it was gone.  i got a chill down the back of my neck.  i knew it was a ufo.  you just get a feeling.
content.summary: Came out of clouds, flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was running in the country southwest of edmonton and noticed a white dot
in the southern sky travelling at a good clip east to west. it has no discernible lines or features. was not a helicopter. was not an aircraft with wings and fuselage. just a quick moving "dot". 

i watched it as it went into clouds and out and it changed tone to darker because of the shadow effect of clouds. the duration was about 1- 2 minutes until it disappeared in the western sky.  i estimate it was travelling at sub-sonic speed but quickly. i had plenty of time to
realize there were no features describing a helicopter or aircraft. 

there is an international airport south of edmonton however, as i said, it had no features of an aircraft. it probably was, but i have seen countless many aircraft in the distance in the skies and under many circumstances and they all are obviously planes or helicopters.
content.summary: Small white dot travelling strait line east to west rather quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I am a california attorney. i meditate, i'm a reiki master, i seek
higher consciousness, self-realization and enlightenment. i am now into
taoism & buddhism. i am also a little into remote viewing & remote
influencing. i consider myself to be spiritual. my relationship to god
is of primary importance in my life. i also have my bs degree in
zoology/biology.

i had a few out of body experiences while meditating many years ago.

at 3:00 am on sat august 25, 2007 i had my first verifiable "encounter"
with something i never experienced before. while reading a book on taoism before bedtime, i was surprised that our cockatiel bird began his talking routine just before 3:00 am while in the total dark with a bed sheet over his cage like usual. he has never done this before. i thought that was odd, continued reading, then got into bed & fell asleep.

just after i fell asleep i was abruptly & consciously aware of a higher pitched noise and a beam of 2 shades of green pulling what felt like only my consciousness, not my body, up and into a dimly lit domed room/place. i said to myself "oh no, not again," then fought it and began to awake, it being hard to move or call my wife's name out loud. she was asleep upstairs.

when i sat up fully awake at 3:00 am, the hairs on both arms & legs were standing up & i was pretty much in terror. i am age 50 and can't recall the last time my hair ever stood on end! my room was dark and as i sat there, i saw in 2 shades of green, what i describe as threads of green light everywhere that i looked in the room. i got out of bed, walked all over my 2 story house, didn't wake anyone up, looked out my front door, calmed down & went back to bed & fell asleep. i didn't tell my wife or daughter till that evening & believe me, that was a very difficult thing to do. it seemed so weird to even hear myself utter the description of what i went thru.

a few days later, my wife went next door & talked to the neighbor woman  about listing their house for sale, as the prior listing expired. she asked my wife if anything weird happened in our house at 3:00 am on 9/25. my wife said no. the neighbor then told her that at 3:00 am their home burglar alarm went off, "went crazy," & a wind like a tornado rattled their windows, then the next morning, while washing their backyard patio, as they do every morning, they washed away a burnt dust, saying it was not dirt, it was some kind of weird burned dust or particles.

my wife came back & said to me "you'll never believe what the neighbor just told me." my hair stood a little on end again when she told me the above. it was so cool to have my experience verified by my neighbor - that something really happened - that i wasn't dreaming or that i imagined it.

i like astronomy, & star trek, but never read about abductions or ever thought much about it.

i have heard weird sounds at night in bed coming from outside up above, kind of freaked me out, then feel asleep. i have no memory of anything happening. i love to take a mile walk several times a week after dark & pick out many stars by name - done that for years.
content.summary: Attempted abduction/transport of consciousness & possibly body

content.detailedDescription: Trabajaba y afuera de mi taller vi el objeto y le tome varias fotos y video

content.detailedDescription: First of all,keep the job up arizona ufo spotter!Forget about the debunkers!You have inspired me to tell my continuous nightly(after sunset)sighting experiences as of late.(1)8-10 months ago,the objects started as disc shaped it seemed.I had binoculars,but they were at such a distance,i couldn't make them out clearly enough.They had the blinking blue,red,green,yellow lights on them.I call them watcher's,as they are here practically every night at basically the same part of the sky.(2)beginning about 2 or 3 months ago,they changed to a purple gold twinkling diamond shaped objects.Directly in the center of them horizonally, is a slim black observation deck going all the way across.You can see an exact object like the one i seen on you tube by searching october 2007 ufo.Also lately,have been objects with white lights.The pattern of the white lights was: blink, blink blink blink, blink. some i have watched have dipped below tree lines slowly decending towards the ground.The other one's that travel a couple of thousand feet up in the air at one point seem to be going at a constant movement,will suddenly skip forward much quicker at intervals while it is flying.Truely,something strange is going on in the skies above us.Keep an eye out folks,we are not alone!                                                                    seen all of this with my sister most of the time on a wrap around porch of our raised house.We were ufo hunting.We still to this day keep feeling amazed to see these things continuing.My feelings are neither of fret or good.I hope they are good though.Thanks-----
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cigar,  Cylinder,  Diamond,  Disc,  Oval,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: Amazing reoccurance of ufo activity nightly

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing by lake virginia at dinky dock park this morning just after 7:30am.  this is a daily ritual for me on the weekdays before i start work in the area.  the sun had risen, and there were a few light clouds.  there was no wind.  the area is in the flight path of jets landing at orlando international airport, which is approximately 10 miles to the south.
 
i was staring out over the lake when i looked up and noticed a black form flying towards the lake from the west.  at first i thought it was a large bird such as a vulture or eagle circling over the lake.  the object was dark, big, silent, and was not traveling at a high rate of speed.  as i examined it more closely, i could see that it was not a bird.  the object descended, and for a moment, i thought it could be someone parachuting into town, but i didn't see any evidence of a person beneath the object.  it stopped descending and began to slowly fly to the northeast, towards the casselberry area.  despite the object being very dark, the rear of the object reflected in the newly risen sun as it flew out of sight.  there are some cypress trees by the lake, which obscured my view of the object as it flew away.  when it was shining in the sun, it appeared to be spherical - i'm not sure if the object actually changed shape as i watched it, or if i had misjudged its shape when i first noticed it.
 
a few strange things about the object:  it seemed to be flying low.  it was difficult to determine its exact shape.  it was completely silent.  it seemed big, but i was unable to determine its size without a nearby sufficient frame of reference.  the moon was still visible in the sky - if i had to compare it to the moon, i'd say that it wasn't big enough to have obscured the moon had it flown over it.  also, it seemed to appear from the west - it was just there over the lake somewhat suddenly, but it's possible that nearby trees obscured it from my view.
 
my only thoughts on what it might have been is a balloon, but not a hot-air balloon.  it seemed to be following a definite flight path - not randomly being carried by air currents and ascending and descending.  also, the shape seemed to be off.
 
i'm wondering if anyone else saw this object today.  it flew towards a very busy road during morning rush hour traffic - highway 436 in winter park - when i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Strange object over winter park

content.detailedDescription:
i was about 16years old . i am over 50 now. i can not remember the exact date so this is an approximation as to the date. the incident happened in hartwick township michigan between evart and marion. to be exact over what is now 80th ave., between hicks lake road and sunrise lake road.
it was a clear, sunny, very nice day with few clouds.  i guess it was around 1600 hrs.  my dad called us older boys outside and made the little guys stay in the house.  out to the west of the house about ��� mile away or less were a couple of  saucer shaped , silver colored objects completely motionless in the sky above the tree line . i guess the altitude to be about 1,000 feet or less.  then suddenly i saw another come in from the south and join them in formation. then another . i honestly don't remember the exact number of ships total but they formed a group of several identical craft . they came in fast like a blur that became solid and visible to the eye. my guess is that they were decelerating from an extremely high speed.  

my dad handed me a pair of binoculars and i could see the craft very clearly.
i remember seeing symbols and shapes on the side of one of the craft. i can remember a couple of the shapes being a triangle, a crescent, and what looked like saturn or a circle with a ring through it. the other symbols i have never seen before or since.  (i had 20/15 vision at the time). i was so fascinated with the symbols that i cant remember much more about the ships except they were metallic silver like stainless steel. i guess they were about 20-30 feet long and a smaller dome sat on the top. 

after handing the binoculars back to my dad .  we watched them for a while longer and i just remember my dad muttering ���what the heck are  those?���
i just thought at the time maybe we have some sort of secret weapons or something like that. then all at once they began to glow brightly the entire craft glowed like molten metal. then all at once they sped off faster than any lightning strike i had ever seen .  it was a blur going up and out  to the north. and they vanished in less than a split second. i  never told anyone about this until i became old  enough to realize that if i didn���t  tell anyone, this information would be lost forever.  
i have never seen anything like this since.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw several disk or saucer sheped craft silver metalic in color in broad daylight could  see words or symbols on sides  they were motionless then glowed like fire and sped off in a blur at extreme speeds.

content.detailedDescription: I was waking home from work down 29th street (got off work around 9:00 p.M.  hour and a half to two hour walk). i was close to 29th and wayne walking west.  i saw the object fly above me about 50 feet up or less.  the trajectory was arched downward.  it flew in lower and disappeared behind the trees of shunga park (a large wooded park in topeka that i was walking beside)and seemed to land based upon the trajectory.  it was flying in a northernly direction.  it appeared to be approximately the length of a ford 350.  it was faintly illuminated in the center with a light that appeared to come from within and permiate it's casing.  more eye-shaped than oval.  appeared to be slightly wider than it was tall.  the prow and aft were not illuminated, nor were to port and starboard edges. just the center.  it seemed that the light was diffused by the casing.  it was a faint white light.
content.summary: Oval object that was illuminated with a faint light from within (front and back extended ends less illuminated.)
